channel.title: raster on datanalytics
channel.description: Recent content in raster on datanalytics

item.title: t y as.raster no conmutan; ¿por qué no conmutarán?
item.description: Creo una minimatriz, la convierto en un raster y la represento: m <- matrix(c(0, 0, 0.33, 0.66, .9, .9), 2, 3) m # [,1] [,2] [,3] # [1,] 0 0.33 .9 # [2,] 0 0.66 .9 r <- as.raster(m) r # [,1] [,2] [,3] # [1,] "#000000" "#545454" "#FFFFFF" # [2,] "#000000" "#A8A8A8" "#FFFFFF" plot(r, interpolate = FALSE) Ahora, con la matriz traspuesta, r_t_1 <- as.raster(t(m)) r_t_1 # [,1] [,2] # [1,] "#000000" "#000000" # [2,] "#545454" "#A8A8A8" # [3,] "#E6E6E6" "#E6E6E6" obtengo
